Text:
Classification: Scripted
Genre: Children | Comedy | Family
Status: New Series
Network: Sky One ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Fridays at 09:30 pm
Runtime: 30 Minutes
Premiere: September 14, 2012
Episode Order: 6

Moone Boy, which will be set in 80s Ireland, takes its cue from Chris O'Dowd's episode of Little Crackers, which told the story of a young boy and his imaginary friend.

The new show will explore the life and adventures of Martin Moone and invisible buddy Sean, using Martin's chaotic, scatter-brained family life as a backdrop.
(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-30779)
